title: Travel: Distance (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Distance subcategory within Travel. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: How far is it from Shinjuku to Shibuya?
cards.romaji: Shinjuku kara Shibuya made dono kurai desu ka.
cards.japanese: 新宿から渋谷までどのくらいですか。
